description.value:
You gain basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a new spell slot of a new level from the Armiger archetype, add two common spells from your selected tradition of that level into your spellbook. During your daily preparations, you prepare a number of spells from your spellbook into your collection equal to the total number of spell slots you have.

In addition, when you gain a new spell slot from the Armiger archetype, you gain an additional spell slot that you can only prepare valid spells for Armiger’s Strike. You can use focus points to cast a spell in your collection or a spell you have prepared in your dedicated spell slots for Armiger’s Strike, even if the spell slots have already been used, following the cost described for Ether spell costs.
